action.name: Log
action.param: JS.Value("format", "comparing version {x}.{y}.{z} ({string}) to {x}.{y}.{z} ({string})", from_x, from_y, from_z, Function.Param(0), to_x, to_y, to_z, Function.Param(1))

params - ax, ay, bx1, by1, bx2, by2

action.name: Set return value
action.param: JS.JSCodeValue("#0 >= #2 && #0 <= #2 + #4 && #1 >= #3 && #1 <= #3 + #5", Function.Param(0), Function.Param(1), Function.Param(2), Function.Param(3), Function.Param(4), Function.Param(5))

sub-events.comment: get unix timestamp (in seconds or milliseconds)

action.name: Set return value
action.param: JS.Value("format", "{yyyy}-{mm}-{dd} | {hh}:{mm}", Date.Year(date), zeropad(Date.Month(date), 2), zeropad(Date.Date(date), 2), zeropad(Date.Hours(date), 2), zeropad(Date.Minutes(date), 2) )

action.name: Set return value
action.param: JS.Value("format", "LOADING {what}... {progress}%"&newline&"{current}MB / {max}MB", JSON_AudioPreload.CurrentTask = "SoundEffects" ? "SOUNDS" : "MUSIC", round((Function.ReturnValue / JSON_AudioPreload.AudioSize) * 100), Function.ReturnValue, JSON_AudioPreload.AudioSize)

action.name: Alert
action.param: "Notice!"&newline &newline& "Please use a browser that's at least newer than 2018 before reporting issues, i'm begging you, thanks!"&newline& "This is a one-time reminder"
